xwikidoc.title: Scheduler job that synchronize LDAP users

property.jobDescription: This jobs takes the synchronization list document (as defined in the LDAP section of the administration), and if this one is not empty, iterates over N entries, and synchronize them. N is the size of a synchronization batch and is also defined in the administration
